wisps.scripts.metar_driver module¶

wisps.scripts.metar_driver.add_time(start, end, stride=None)¶

Create and return Time objects

wisps.scripts.metar_driver.check_num_procs(num_procs)¶
wisps.scripts.metar_driver.get_globals()¶

Returns a dictionary of global attributes for metar QC

wisps.scripts.metar_driver.main(control_file=None)¶
  1. Reads control file
  2. Reads METAR and packages data into a station data type
  3. Preprocesses the station data
  4. QCs the observation data
  5. Postprocesses the station data
  6. Constructs an output NetCDF file
  7. Fills NetCDF file with QC’d obersvation data
wisps.scripts.metar_driver.pack_station_names(names)¶

wisps.scripts.mospred_driver module¶

class wisps.scripts.mospred_driver.Predictor(searchable_dict, procedures=None, leadTime=None, fcstRef=None)¶
wisps.scripts.mospred_driver.calculate(predictor)¶

Given an internal Predictor object, calculate the variable associated with the observed property

wisps.scripts.mospred_driver.main(control_file=None)¶

Driver for mospred. Will take a list of predictors, calculate those that are unavailable, apply procedures, and interpolate to stations.

wisps.scripts.mospred_driver.preprocess_entries(entry_dict, fcst_ref_time)¶

Preprocess a dictionary into a convenience Predictor object. Return said object.
